name: Groundhog Day [non-meditations version]
description:
This is an alternate 'anglo' version of a game made for meditations.games. You can play the original on Feb 2nd annually.

Controls:
Click to advance, P to restart the game. 

--

6hs, completed in January 2019. This is the original version of the game before I realized that the meditation projects aren't supposed to have text or a start screen! Whoops!

The windows version was originally designed to terminate itself, but in order to make it mac compatible I had to lose that feature / export to HTML. \o/

Created with GameMaker: Studio 2.
